mapper.insert: insert into TICKET(TKT_NAME, ORIGINAL_AMOUNT, PRICE, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, LOCATION, INSTRUCTION, ADDRESS, NOTICE, HOWUSE, CANXPOLICY, KIND) values(#{tktName}, #{originalAmount}, #{price}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{location}, #{instruction}, #{address}, #{notice}, #{howUse}, #{canxPolicy}, #{kind})
mapper.select: select TKT_NAME tktName, ORIGINAL_AMOUNT originalAmount, PRICE, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, LOCATION, INSTRUCTION, ADDRESS, NOTICE, HOWUSE, CANXPOLICY, KIND from TICKET where TKT_ID = #{tktId}
select TKT_ID, TKT_NAME, ORIGINAL_AMOUNT, PRICE, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, TTL_SCORE, TTL_PEOPLE, LOCATION, INSTRUCTION, STATUS, SOLD_AMOUNT, KIND from TICKET where TKT_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{tktName},'%')
select TKT_ID, TKT_NAME, ORIGINAL_AMOUNT, PRICE, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, TTL_SCORE, TTL_PEOPLE, LOCATION, INSTRUCTION, STATUS, SOLD_AMOUNT from TICKET where KIND = #{kind}
select TKT_ID, TKT_NAME, ORIGINAL_AMOUNT, PRICE, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, TTL_SCORE, TTL_PEOPLE, INSTRUCTION, STATUS, SOLD_AMOUNT, KIND from TICKET where LOCATION = #{location}
select TKT_ID, TKT_NAME from TICKET where STATUS = #{status}
select TKT_NAME, LOCATION, INSTRUCTION, KIND from TICKET ORDER BY TTK_SCORE DESC LIMIT 3
select TKT_NAME, LOCATION, INSTRUCTION, KIND from TICKET ORDER BY TTK_PEOPLE DESC LIMIT 3
